detaileddescription.para:
Processing cycle time in ms
values 10u

DoIP logical address of Chorus
values 0x1010U

Default DoIP logical address assigned for the external tester client
values 0x0E80U

Default DoIP logical address assigned for the Onboard/internal(SWMC) tester client
values 0x0F02U

DoIP default protocol version and its inverse value grouped in a 2 bytes value. See ISO 13400-2, Table 11
values 0x02FDu

Default DoIP protocol version and its inverse value for vehicle identification request messages grouped in a 2 bytes value. See ISO 13400-2, Table 11
values 0xFF00u

Maximum number of TCP sockets which can be opened
values 2u

Default max size (in bytes) of a diagnostic request that a Server can process
values 4095u

Default max size (in bytes) containing the DoIP header
values compute based on other two defines

DoIP logical address unknown
values 0xFFFFU

Define used for socket handler unknown
values 0xFFFFU

IPv4 socket domain invalid
values 0xFFFFU

briefdescription.para: Get a short word in network order (big-endian).

parameterdescription.para: - pointer to data to be converted

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: The function is used as static inline in the header file

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. Helper function used to convert the data into uint16(big-endian)

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Check if global data is properly initialized TEST_DoIP_Main__DoIP_Init

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. helper function for initialization of global data

briefdescription.para: Cyclic routine (100 ms) of the DoIP functionality.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach each case and check the global variable according field TEST_DoIP_Main__DoIP_MainFunction TEST_DoIP_Main__DoIP_MainFunction_1

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach each case and check the global variable according field TEST_DoIP_Main__DoIP_ActivationLineChanged

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. Helper function for triggering activation/deactivation of diagnosis

briefdescription.para: Retrigger cyclic transmission of 'VehicleID response' in case of OBD link-up.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach each case and check the global variable according field TEST_DoIP_Main__DoIP_ObdLinkChanged

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. Function used to retrigger cyclic transmission of 'VehicleID response' in case of OBD link-up

briefdescription.para: Service called when new data is received that must be processed by DoIP layer.

parameterdescription.para: - socket handler identifying the local socket resource
- IP address and port of the remote host
- data length of the received TCP segment or UDP datagram

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach each case TEST_DoIP_Main__DoIP_RxIndication

briefdescription.para: Extracts single DoIP frames from underneath communication layer and pass them to processing phase.

parameterdescription.para: - socket handler identifying the local socket resource
- IP address and port of the remote host
- data length of the received TCP segment or UDP datagram

simplesect.para: Number of bytes that have been processed from given buffer

If a DoIP Message (mostly Diagnostic Message) exceeds the maximum TCP Segment Size (1,5k) it will be segmented. A Tester is obligated to not shuffle sending TCP Segments if more than one DoIP Message has to be send.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach each case and return value TEST_DoIP_Main__DoIP_RxIndication_DecodeNextMessage TEST_DoIP_Main__DoIP_RxIndication_DecodeNextMessage_1

briefdescription.para: DoIP_Terminate is usually called to tear down a running DoIP session.

simplesect.para: Note that furhter trials to reestablish a DoIP session will be rejected

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check the global variable according field TEST_DoIP_Main__DoIP_Terminate

briefdescription.para: Callback function for CAN diagnostic request.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check the global variable according field TEST_DoIP_Main__DoIP_DiagCANReqReceivedCbk
